name: Toxic Business
description:
A game about what to do when you have too much toxic waste. Why not burn down the forest while you're at it?

The goal of the game is to get the toxic waste pipe all the way to the swedish water. 

Controls: WASD + mouse

Sonen gamejam, theme: Limit

  • Main programmer: Haakon Drews
  • Art and programming: Thor Merlin Lervik
  • Music: DST

2015
